attributes.action: Ban fireworks in residential areas unless a licensed public event.
attributes.additional_details:
Firework displays should only be allowed on Guy Fawkes Day, New Years Eve and Chinese New Year. They should only be licensed public displays. The selling of fireworks to the general public should be banned.
Displays during November go on for over a week in built up residential areas and cause so much distress to people and animals. It is disgraceful that this is allowed in 2025
attributes.background:
Fireworks in residential back gardens are dangerous and cause stress to animals. The Government is allowing animal cruelty in 2025!
Firewood displays should only be allowed on set days and organised licenced displays only.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
